entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
